name: com.frameworksxd.savesxd
description:
A save system. Quick startup:

1. Make new class: "public class SaveSystemImplementation : SaveSystem<SaveData, ConfigFileData>"
2. Attach to a gameobject
3. Create a new save file: "SaveSystemImplementation.Instance.SetCurrentSaveData(new SaveData(0, "testSave"));"
4. Save game to file or to memory: "SaveSystemImplementation.Instance.SaveCurrentSaveData"
5. Load save file from file: "SaveSystemImplementation.Instance.LoadSaveFile"
5.1. After loading from file: "SaveSystemImplementation.Instance.SetCurrentSaveData"
6. Load save data: "SaveSystemImplementation.Instance.LoadCurrentSaveData"
